attributes.action: Scrap the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy (Continuation Petition)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to attract the attention of Tony Blair to not introduce the proposed road pricing tax. This Petition is a continuation of the previous petition and designed to gain more signatures.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
